Author: NewBullMoose
Text: Yes I took it and I was pissed when my gp prescribed it because I had heard the same thing about weight gain. I was only on it for a few months but I did not experience any weight gain. Like most antidepressants the reported weight gain comes from an increase in appetite, which I didn't even really experience. Every person is different but I don't think you need to worry too much.
